Data Fields

pj_ip_mreq Struct Reference
[Socket Abstraction]

Data Fields

pj_in_addr imr_multiaddr
pj_in_addr imr_interface

Detailed Description

This structure provides multicast group information for IPv4 addresses.

Field Documentation

pj_in_addr pj_ip_mreq::imr_interface

local IP address of interface.

pj_in_addr pj_ip_mreq::imr_multiaddr

IP multicast address of group.
